title: HeaderFrom Single Message Transform
description: Configuration schema for HeaderFrom transformation. Copies a field from the key or value to a header.

type.description: The transformation type. Use 'org.apache.kafka.connect.transforms.HeaderFrom$Key' to copy from key or 'org.apache.kafka.connect.transforms.HeaderFrom$Value' to copy from value.
type.title: type

fields.description: Comma-separated list of field names to copy to headers. The header name will be the same as the field name unless 'headers' is specified.
fields.title: fields

headers.description: Comma-separated list of header names. Must match the number of fields specified. If not provided, header names will match field names.
headers.title: headers

defaultSnippets.label: HeaderFrom - Copy field from value to header
defaultSnippets.description: Copy a field from the record value to a header with the same name. Replace 'correlationId' with your actual field name.
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
**HeaderFrom** - Copy a field from the record value to a header.

The header name will be the same as the field name. Replace `correlationId` with your actual field name.

**Use case:** Move correlation IDs, trace IDs, or other metadata from the payload to headers for easier access without parsing the value.

defaultSnippets.label: HeaderFrom - Copy multiple fields with custom header names
defaultSnippets.description: Copy multiple fields to headers with custom names. Field and header lists must match in order. Replace with your actual field and header names.
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription:
**HeaderFrom** - Copy multiple fields to headers with custom names.

Field and header lists must match in order. Replace with your actual field and header names.

**Use case:** Standardize header naming (e.g., add `X-` prefix) or rename fields when moving to headers.
